titleStmt.title: An incorruptible key composed of the CX Psalme wherewith you may open the rest of the Holy Scriptures ... / by Samuel Gorton, Gent. ...
titleStmt.author: Gorton, Samuel, 1592 or 3-1677.

notesStmt.note: Text apparently printed in sections, the second (119 p.) with separate pagination, although the text is continuous.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
